Query: How to recall a sent mail ?
Solution: If it is on gmail, you will immediately see a undo button upon sending a mail. Click that will recall your sent mail.

A bot is a software program that operates on the Internet and performs repetitive tasks. While some bot traffic is from good bots, bad bots can have a huge negative impact on a website or application.
A chatbot is a piece of software that conducts a conversation via auditory or textual methods.
Rasa is an open source Conversational AI framework.
